description: The fan columbine, also known as Aquilegia flabellata var. pumila 'Silver Edge', is a sight to behold with its stunning blue and white bell-shaped flowers. The name "fan columbine" refers to its unique foliage that opens up in the shape of a fan. Low-growing and dwarf, it can fit into small garden spaces and make a big impact with its mounding habit and incredible display of blooming flowers. In late spring and early summer, you can expect the white petals with just a hint of blue to blanket your garden in a truly breathtaking way. Fan columbine is a delight to behold!
